title: Senior Partnership Manager

description:
Join forces with the finest team of marketing magic makers to lead the development and implementation of key partnerships for Enchant. This role is pivotal in aligning each venue with strategic partners to enhance the overall experience and drive ticket sales. Enchant’s partnership efforts should increase market reach and community access to the event. Your primary responsibility is to curate and execute partnerships that resonate with our audience, creating unforgettable moments, and maximizing revenue opportunities. As such, you enjoy networking and building meaningful relationships.

WHO WE ARE:

We are creators of a magical holiday experience called Enchant Christmas featuring the World’s Largest Christmas Light Maze. We have hosted over 7+ million guests over the past 7 years and have experienced significant growth.

WHAT YOU WILL BE ACCOUNTABLE FOR:

Strategic Partnership Development:
• Identify, develop, and nurture relationships with key partners aligning with target audience and brand values
• Craft and propose unique partnership concepts for each event night, ensuring alignment with company theme and values
• Execute a relevant strategic partnership plan for every partnership owned, ensuring partnership launches, maintenance, project timelines, event impact, and business results are achieved

Revenue Generation:
• Collaborate with partners to create mutually beneficial revenue-sharing models
• Develop and implement strategies to maximize ticket sales through strategic partnerships
• Work closely with Business Development team members to identify additional revenue streams through sponsorships and group sales opportunities

Event Integration:
• Lead and oversee the collaboration with the Event Production team to seamlessly on-board local event producers to each partner activation on-site
• Ensure all partner branding and messaging align with overall aesthetic and narrative, collaboration with Creative Services, Guest Services, and other relevant internal stakeholders

Team Leadership:
• Manage a team of Partnership & Promotion Managers nationally and on the ground in the event markets, providing guidance, support, and leadership
• Foster a collaborative and innovative team culture focused on achieving revenue targets and partnership
• Research, recommend, attend/participate in appropriate regional, professional organizations or events to represent Enchant and extend our reach

Performance Analysis:
• Track and analyze the performance of each partnership, providing regular reports to the Vice President of Marketing
• Implement data-driven insights to optimize future partnerships and enhance overall event success.

WHAT YOU BRING TO THE TEAM:
• 7+ years of relevant post-secondary education and experience in: Marketing, Communications, Business Development, Account Management or Client Relationship Management with a focus in strategic brand partnerships
• Proven track record of successfully developing and executing strategic partnerships that drive revenue
• Strong leadership skills with experience managing a team and multiple projects
• Exceptional negotiation and communication skills
• Creative thinker with the ability to conceptualize and implement unique ideas
• Familiarity with the events and entertainment industry is a plus
• Software skills required: Google Suite
• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
• Ability to effectively collaborate with stakeholders across the company
• A sincere desire to help create magical memories
• Your own personal values are aligned with those of Enchant; Driven, Courageous, Sincere, Magical

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU:
• Competitive Benefits Package
• Remote work environment with team members spread out across the world
• Flexibility on hours worked
• The tools you need to get the job done well - personalized equipment package
• We’re a small yet mighty team so you’ll have impact almost immediately
• We’re scaling! So, there’s an opportunity to grow with us in whatever professional area you’re looking to grow
• Last but certainly not least, you’re an integral part of creating Holiday traditions and creating magical memories! Plus free tickets to our Enchant events ;)

Are you ready to join our team of magic makers? Apply today. We’re excited to meet you!

Enchant is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome members of all backgrounds and perspectives to apply. We’re committed to continually developing and upholding an inclusive and diverse environment where every voice, perspective, and idea is heard. We embrace differences and know that our diverse team is our strength and what drives our innovation. Federal law requires all employers to verify the identity and employment eligibility of all persons hired to work in the United States, Enchant is an E-Verify participant.
